name: 404 STORY
description:
这是一个project1论坛（原66RPG）第20届极短篇游戏比赛的参赛作品，有幸获得最佳创意奖~

本游戏讲述了一段战争背景下温暖感人的小故事，欢迎来品鉴~

基本信息
游戏名称：404 STORY
游戏大小：约129MB
游戏时长：15-20分钟左右
结局信息：2个（有一个算附加的Bad End），另外有一个需要重新打开exe文件才能看到的二周目
游戏类型：几乎是默剧的R剧（表情气泡演绎剧情）+少量文字剧情
制作工具：RPG Maker MV

目前仅支持中文版。

-------------------------------------

This is a game that won the Best Idea Award at the China rpgmaker forum.

This game tells a warm and touching short story in the context of war.

Basic information

Game Name: 404 STORY

Game size: about 129MB

Game length: around 15-20 minutes

Ending information: 2 (one counts as an additional Bad End), please reopen the exe file to see the second week

Genre: Almost pantomime RM-drama (emoji bubble renders the plot) + a small amount of text drama

Production tool: RPG Maker MV

Only the Chinese version is currently supported. Other language versions may be considered if requested.
